title: Five Books to Take On a Desert Island, Why The News Makes You Dumb, and Why Politics is the True National Pastime
author: Collin Hansen

description: Originally released on June 23rd, 2020, Kevin DeYoung, Collin Hansen, and Justin Taylor discuss the five books they would take on a desert island, why the news makes you dumb, and why politics is the true national pastime.
